mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_power) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPower,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_power from admin
select admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_power from admin where admin_name=#{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_power from admin where admin_power like "%"#{adminPower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
select admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_power from admin where admin_name=#{admin_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and admin_password=#{admin_password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
